Introduction

Lee Seokmin, better known by his stage name Deokyeom or DK, is a South Korean singer, dancer, musical actor, songwriter and composer under Pledis Entertainment. He the main vocalist of the boy group SEVENTEEN. DK is a member of the group's vocal unit and is the leader of the sub-unit BSS (BooSeokSoon).

DK debuted as a member of SEVENTEEN on May 26, 2015 with the mini-album 17 Carat. He also debuted as a musical actor in 2019 with the main role "King Arthur" in the Korean musical "XCalibur."
